notes: a single silk thread or piece
example_sentence_italian: Ho comprato una seta per il vestito.
example_sentence_english: I bought a piece of silk for the dress.

example_sentence_italian: Le sete pregiate sono in mostra.
example_sentence_english: The fine silks are on display.

example_sentence_italian: Il colore della seta è delicato.
example_sentence_english: The color of the silk is delicate.

example_sentence_italian: Ha lavorato alla seta per anni.
example_sentence_english: She worked with silk for years.

example_sentence_italian: Dalla seta si ricavavano stoffe pregiate.
example_sentence_english: Fine fabrics were made from silk.

example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato un difetto nella seta.
example_sentence_english: I found a flaw in the silk.

example_sentence_italian: Ho scritto un rapporto sulla seta.
example_sentence_english: I wrote a report about silk.

example_sentence_italian: Con la seta si fanno abiti eleganti.
example_sentence_english: With silk you make elegant clothes.
